wiki.summary: Kelly Clarkson's first single from 4th album All I Ever Wanted out March 10th 2009. On January 28th, 2009 Billboard announced the single leaped 96 spots to land at #1 in its second week on the Hot 100 chart, beating Britney Spears' record by just one to become Kelly's second #1 single, her first since "A Moment Like This." This was written by Dr. Luke and Max Martin and Claude Kelly. According to the My Life Would Suck Without You Songfacts, Martin had "an idea of some of the concepts.

track.name: My Life Would Suck Without You
